verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w courses|strong="H4256"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \add were these\add*. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu, Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar \w executed|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3547"\w*’s office.
